desc: EHRS Functional Model - Record Lifecycle Events - FHIR Implementation Guide
descmd: EHRS Functional Model - Record Lifecycle Events - FHIR Implementation Guide
title: EHRS Functional Model - Record Lifecycle Events Implementation Guide
introduction: This implementation guide describes the expected capabilities for an Electronic Health Record System (EHR-S) that intends to adhere to the ISO/HL7 10781 Electronic Health Record System Functional Model Release 2 which covers the logging of record lifecycle events.
